segments.text: We are looking for a bilingual secretary . Do you think you are proficient in both written and spoken English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think my English is fairly good . As you can see from my CV , I graduated from university with a B . A . degree in English . I studied the English language and English literature systematically .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How are your typing and shorthand skills ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can type 80 words a minute , basically no mistake , and can take dictation in English at 120 words per minute .
segments.speaker: S2
